name: Reovery Run
description: A recovery run is a form of active recovery for runners that involves easy runs at a shorter distance or slower pace than usual

name: Base Run
description: A base run is a relatively short to moderate-length run undertaken at a runner's natural pace

name: Long Run
description: The long run refers to a period of time where all factors of production and costs are variable.

name: Progression Run
description: Progression running is a type of speed work that involves beginning a run at a comfortable, slow pace and ending the run at a faster pace

name: Fartlek Run
description: Fartlek running involves varying your pace throughout your run, alternating between fast segments and slow jog

name: Tempo Run
description: A tempo run is a sustained effort run that builds up your body's ability to run faster for longer periods of time
